text: Alejandro Daslav Jadresic Marinovic (6 June 1956 â€“ 5 June 2019) was a Chilean industrial engineer, economist and academic. He served as Minister of Energy from 1994 to 1998, in the cabinet of President Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle. He was a graduate of the University of Chile and Harvard University. Jadresic died of brain cancer on 5 June 2019, a day before his 63rd birthday. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chilean academics Category:Chilean politicians Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Chilean economists Category:Chilean engineers Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Industrial engineers
title: Alejandro Jadresic
